description:
Eiichiro has decided to become a pro tennis player. After playing a practice match against Ike Souji, who`s the same age but pro, he realizes that his body is not strong enough. This is when Coach Miura prepares a rigorous two-month-long regimen to transform his body. Eiichiro is tense as Coach Miura says that he believe Eiichiro can do this. And then the training begins.
Source: crunchyroll
